## WorldLoopEventPayloads."WORLD\_LOOP.TICK\_ERROR" property

Emitted when an error occurs during a world loop tick.

**Signature:**

```typescript
[WorldLoopEvent.TICK_ERROR]: {
        worldLoop: WorldLoop;
        error: Error;
    };
```
